nouns.defn: the ability, right, or permission to approach, enter, speak with, or use; admittance
the state or quality of being approachable
a way or means of approach
an extensive, continuous part of a surface, space, or body
a part of the earth's surface (land or sea) of considerable and usually indefinite extent
a district without respect to boundaries or extent

prepositions.defn: in the space separating (two points, objects, etc.):

adverbs.defn: in the intervening space or time; in an intermediate position or relation

nouns.defn: a handwritten or printed work of fiction or nonfiction, usually on sheets of paper fastened or bound together within covers.
